ow.routing
クラス RoutingAlgorithmConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  ow.routing.RoutingAlgorithmConfiguration
直系の既知のサブクラス:
KademliaConfiguration, LinearWalkerConfiguration, PlaxtonConfiguration
public class RoutingAlgorithmConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

An instance of this class holds a configuration of a routing algorithm.

adjustRoot

public boolean adjustRoot()
Whether if a routing driver adjusts the result of routing by calling RoutingAlgorithm#adjustRoot(). This propertis should be true for Chord.

queryToAllContacts

public boolean queryToAllContacts()
Whether if a routing driver asks to all contacts it is maintaining. This property should be true for Kademlia.
